content: Choi is a dedicated researcher living in Seoul, who seeks to understand the mysteries of the mind, particularly concerning his father, David. He grew up in a loving family and has become a leading figure in his field. Choi's work is motivated by his desire to help patients and to support his father, who is struggling with health issues.
No, Choi does not come from Japan; he grew up in Korea. His father, David, was born and raised in the United States but moved to Korea for work.

Choi is a dedicated researcher living in Seoul, focused on understanding the mind, especially in relation to his father, David. He grew up in a loving family and has become a leading figure in his field. His work is driven by a desire to help patients and support his father, who is facing health challenges.
